items.content_html: This is one of the reasons why I cannot make myself buy a smart watch. Rugged, solar powered, auto time calibration, auto illuminate and relatively affordable. Best of all, no distractions.
items.content_text: This is one of the reasons why I cannot make myself buy a smart watch. Rugged, solar powered, auto time calibration, auto illuminate and relatively affordable. Best of all, no distractions.

Beautiful shades of blue… ~ May 15, 2020

This was the view when looking away from the sunset in my previous post. The photos were taken just a minute apart.

Re-activated my micro.blog subscription. Trying to see if it will work better as a photo-blog for my sky photos…
